org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.exec.tez

Class GuaranteedTasksAllocator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.exec.tez.GuaranteedTasksAllocator

  • public class GuaranteedTasksAllocator
extends Object
    Implements query resource allocation using guaranteed tasks.

      • translateAllocationToCpus

        public int translateAllocationToCpus(double allocation)
        Returns:
        the number of CPUs equivalent to percentage allocation, for information purposes.

      • updateSessionsAsync

        public int updateSessionsAsync(Double totalMaxAlloc,
                               List<WmTezSession> sessionsToUpdate)
        Updates the session allocations asynchronously.
        Parameters:
        totalMaxAlloc - The total maximum fraction of the cluster to allocate. Used to avoid various artifacts, esp. with small numbers and double weirdness. Null means the total is unknown.
        sessionsToUpdate - Sessions to update based on their allocation fraction.
        Returns:
        The number of executors/cpus allocated.

      • updateSessionAsync

        public void updateSessionAsync(WmTezSession session)
        Updates the session asynchronously with the existing allocation.

      • setClusterChangedCallback

        public void setClusterChangedCallback(Runnable clusterChangedCallback)
        Sets a callback to be invoked on cluster changes relevant to resource allocation.
